name: Efface
description:
A simple 2D puzzle game finished 24 hours in total by the team.

In əfface, the player plays as the light spot on a firefly to chase for ultimate freedom and lights in a beautiful setting. And experiences mixed emotions of sadness, curiosity, and warmness.

Credit

Producer: MOMOAN（桃子）

Designer: Caesir Zhang

Developer: Luga Wang

Composer: Amy Yu

Technical Artist:  laola（熊）

Artists: Tien Wong（佑）

Michelle Fu（biubiu）

Seed Will Grow Up（茶宝）
